title: Chennai death in custody: CCTV footage shows youth running, being chased & hit by police - The Indian Express
content: Chennai death in custody: CCTV footage shows youth running, being chased & hit by police  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: In the video, a man can be seen running from the main road towards a narrow street and falling down after losing balance. He is chased by two policemen and one of them can be seen beating him once with a stick.
